What is it?

Image Cropper is a plugin, built on top of jQuery and jQuery UI, that provides a different kind of cropping experience than other similar tools out there.

Options


      $("#item").imageCropper({
        viewportWidth: Integer,
        viewportHeight: Integer,
        boundaryWidth: Integer,
        boundaryHeight: Integer,
        customClass: String,
        showZoom: Boolean,
        update: Function (cropper) { }
      });
